title: MSBuild package doesn't contain MSBuild.exe.config
body: Since toolsets are defined in `MSBuild.exe.config`, it's required for successful use of MSBuild. But none of our current NuGet packages contain it.

nodes.body: Note that after #883 MSBuild for .NET Core won't look for this file, so it's not required that we ship it. If we change that we should revisit this.
